thread.title: The Biggest Losers From The First Democratic Debate Are Republicans
thread.title_full: The Biggest Losers From The First Democratic Debate Are Republicans

author: Susie Madrak
title: The Biggest Losers From The First Democratic Debate Are Republicans
text:
sharethis 10/14/15 8:04am There have been very few moments where I've been as proud to be a progressive as I am right now. After watching the first Democratic presidential debate, I've never seen such a stark contrast between the two major political parties in this country. What many Americans watched on October 13, 2015 is what a presidential debateâ€¦ Democratic presidential debate , Donald Trump , Republican Party Comments
